name: RemitDATA
overview: RemitDATA, Inc. delivers a suite of Web-based plug-n-work productivity tools for healthcare providers. Its tools focus on the areas of reimbursement management, document management, and sales management. The companyâ€™s products include Sales PRO, a Web-based software program that allows sales and marketing professionals to track, evaluate, and monitor their work in the homecare industry; WebScan, a scanning software; and Reimbursement Pro, a Web-based tool that helps managers and collectors to control their reimbursement process. It offers software as a service. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Memphis, Tennessee with additional offices in Dallas, Texas.
